ModMetaData.name: More Responsive Planet 世界视角UI响应改进
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
In RimWorld, the Planet/World view is very laggy, especially when there are many settlements, factions, landmarks in 1.6. This mod tries to improve the performance of the World view.
环世界的世界视角在1.6版本中非常卡顿，尤其是当有很多定居点、派系和地标时。 这个mod尝试改善世界视角的性能。
